quiz.question: Which video rental chain filed for bankruptcy in 2010 as streaming services grew?
Which handheld gaming device introduced in 1994 competed directly with the Sega Game Gear and failed commercially?
Which infamous dot-com company offered free trial delivery but collapsed after high logistics costs in 2001?
Which dot-com era company used a sock puppet mascot and collapsed during 2000?
Which soda's return to its original formula followed public rejection of a 1985 reformulation?
Which Microsoft acquisition of a mobile phone maker cost about $7.2 billion and failed to revive Windows Phone?
Which HP tablet running webOS launched in 2011 then got discontinued after poor sales?
Which company's camera division succeeded after pivoting while Kodak declined in digital transition?
Which company used the tagline 'We try harder' and later shuttered under bankruptcy pressures from online competition?
Which high-profile health startup was exposed for fraudulent blood-testing technology?
Which video game company left console hardware in 2001 after Dreamcast discontinuation?
Which auditing firm was implicated and destroyed due to shredding documents related to Enron in 2001?
Which smartphone by Amazon launched in 2014 and failed to attract mainstream buyers?
Which dot-com grocery startup spent heavily on infrastructure before collapsing in 2001?
Which failed consumer product by Google targeted social sharing but was discontinued after privacy and adoption issues?
